scripts.test:safari:all: npx playwright test --project=webkit --project='MacBook Air 13' --project='MacBook Pro 14' --project='MacBook Pro 16' --project='iMac 24'
scripts.test:iphone:all: npx playwright test --project='iPhone SE' --project='iPhone 12 Mini' --project='iPhone 12' --project='iPhone 12 Pro Max' --project='iPhone 13' --project='iPhone 13 Pro Max' --project='iPhone 14' --project='iPhone 14 Pro Max' --project='iPhone 15' --project='iPhone 15 Pro Max'
scripts.test:ipad: npx playwright test --project='iPad Mini' --project='iPad' --project='iPad Pro 11' --project='iPad Pro 12.9'
